posts.post_title: T206 John McGraw Piedmont 350-460 Factory 25 SGC 30
posts.post_content: Hi all - looking to move this card (see scans). Now $105.00 OBO net to me including S/H with tracking. Please let me know if you have any questions or need any add’l pics.  Thanks!!
